mapper.sql: dynamic_id, train_id , user_id, username, title, content, create_time, state, verify_time, verify_userid, create_username

dynamic.dynamic_id, dynamic.train_id , dynamic.user_id, dynamic.username, dynamic.title, dynamic.content, dynamic.create_time, dynamic.state, dynamic.verify_time, dynamic.verify_userid, dynamic.create_username
attachment.description as atta_description, attachment_description, attachment_instance, attachment_id
mapper.select: select ,,train.name as train_name from tab_pb_edu_train_dynamic dynamic left join tab_pb_edu_train train on train.train_id = dynamic.train_id left join tab_pb_attachment attachment on dynamic.dynamic_id = attachment.host_id and attachment.attachment_type = ${@com.egovchina.partybuilding.common.util.AttachmentType@TRAINDYNAMIC} and attachment.del_flag = 0 where dynamic.dynamic_id = #{dynamicId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into tab_pb_edu_train_dynamic (dynamic_id, train_id,user_id, username, title, content, create_time, state, verify_time, verify_userid, create_username) values (#{dynamicId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trainId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{verifyUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update tab_pb_edu_train_dynamic
#{trainId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

verify_userid = #{verifyUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT},

where dynamic_id = #{dynamicId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tab_pb_edu_train_dynamic set train_id = #{trainId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, verify_time = #{verifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, verify_userid = #{verifyUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_username = #{createUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dynamic_id = #{dynamicId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
